WELCOME TO THE LOUNGE

VELVET LOUNGE gives you V.I.P. access to the sultry melodies, liquid atmospheres, and forward-thinking rhythms of future soul.

HEART OF SOUL

Create your own future classics. Melodic kits packed with sampled Rhodes, vocals, organs, pads, guitar chords, and licks provide the foundation. MASSIVE patches fill out the low end, while REAKTOR PRISM adds touches of bells. SFX kits feature processed field recordings, sampled guitar harmonics, and more. And trap-style programming, exclusive MASCHINE Drum Synth presets, and 808 beats add the sophisticated, contemporary edge.

ELEGANT ATMOSPHERE

Future soul is the bridge between the deep musicality of classic soul and the cutting-edge production of contemporary urban styles. VELVET LOUNGE draws on elements of the past but with a laser-sharp focus on experimentation. The result is futuristic music that is sophisticated, elegant, and progressive.

AT A GLANCE

Drum kits	        50
Projects	         6
Instruments	         4
MASSIVE presets	        43
Drum Synth presets	24
REAKTOR PRISM presets	17
Patterns	       140

System requirements:
MASCHINE STUDIO/MASCHINE/MASCHINE MIKRO 2.3 or higher, MASSIVE (latest update), REAKTOR PRISM (latest update).
